http://57364975046485.blogspot.com/2017/08/blog-post_29.html
I'm assuming 1.1 is meant to be 1.01 as there is no 1.1 on redump.org


2017年8月26日
Star Fox Adventures (1.1 USA) AR Codes
Program codes. Emulator may needs to clear Just-In-Time compiler cache to enable code.

$Skip Arwing
041899fc 38600060
04189a00 4becba65
0420da6c 60000000
042312cc 48000068
0422d460 60000000
0417caa8 a87e001a
0417caac 2c0309d8
0417cab0 40820044﻿

$FireFly Long Life and Strong Light
021877B2 00007FFF
043E4734 447A0000

$Stop Cursor in "The Test Of Fear"
041C5068 60000000

$First Price Shown in ThornTail Store is Discounted
041E686C 38638C15

$Kill Drakor (not allowed during cutscene)
0420B598 807C0544
0420B59C 2C030001

$Kill Drakor
0420B5A0 4800000C

$HighTop in Dragon Rock Infinite Health
0421F23C 60000000

$CloudRunner in Dragon Rock Infinite Health
042C189C 60000000

$Advanced Moon Jump (B:up , R:stop , A:down , Z:move)
043E8BA8 40A00000
043E8CB4 C0A00000
043E8D18 3F266666
BA33A512 00000020
42343558 00143DCC
043E8BA8 00000000
043E8CB4 00000000
00000000 40000000
BA33A512 00000010
043E8CB4 C1200000
043E8BA8 41200000
043E8D18 40800000
42343558 00143DCC
00000000 40000000
BA33A512 00000200
42343558 00144000
00000000 40000000
3A33A512 00000100
42343558 0014C000

$Character Modifier
40343558 0000AD0x
x:
0=Krystal
1=Fox
2=SharpClaw

$Ignore Water
42343558 016CC7C3
42343558 04AAC7C3

$Laser (Press Y)
3A33A512 00000800
40343558 00038D2F
